attributes.action: Have fuel retailers in Newbury reduce the disparity in their pricing of fuel
attributes.additional_details:
As per the letter from Laura Farris MP to Graham Stuart MP in October, these disparities need to be investigated.

https://www.laurafarris.org.uk/news/laura-shares-fuel-prices-concerns-minister-responsible
attributes.background:
Our MP Laura Farris has raised this months ago but we need action in these difficult times, a difference of 16p per litre within 20 miles.As reported in the Newbury Weekly News.
https://www.newburytoday.co.uk/news/i-think-newbury-people-have-been-ripped-off-for-years-pe-9285991/

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about fuel prices are a matter for individual retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Cap profit fuel forecourt operators can make on petrol and diesel to 10p/litre: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616956
